body:
You want to know how the famous swing state will vote so you're interested in **Florida Polls**?

There's a better source.

You need betting data from Betfair. The global betting exchange uses **[The Wisdom of Crowds](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Wisdom_of_Crowds)** to create much more accurate predictions.

We can explain Betfair in a moment but let's get to what you want to see.

- - -

## **Donald Trump Florida Odds vs Joe Biden**





<canvas id='g13' name="brgraph" data-file-name="TexasOdds.json" data-only-names="Republicans,Democrats" data-start="2020-03-04 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>
title: Florida Polls & Presidential Election Betting
seoTitle: Florida Polls For The US Election | Trump Florida Betting Odds vs Biden
description: We can do better than show you the Florida Polls.  We're going to show you the exact Presidential Election Betting for Texas.
